title: Teenager shot multiple times in Park Hill neighborhood
content:
LOUISVILLE, Ky. (WDRB) -- A teenager was shot several times Wednesday night in the Park Hill neighborhood.
MetroSafe says it happened just after 6 p.m. in the 1300 block of Cypress Street near Dumesnil Street.
A 17-year-old black male was found with "multiple" gunshot wounds. He was transported to University Hospital, but LMPD says he is expected to survive.
There are no suspects in this case. If you have any information, you're asked to call the anonymous tip line at 574-LMPD.
